Information (description) about Mathemat: Applied science is a bridge that connects pure, basic science like physics or chemistry with engineering practices. Faculty and students in applied science employ fundamental physical and chemical principles to create innovative new technologies. These novel solutions are then handed off to engineering disciplines to be refined, enhanced and used to address important societal problems. This department consists  Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry, Humanities

Information (description) about English: The Department of English is a full time regular course for improving existing standards of Communicative English. At under graduate level, our curriculum extends through creative writing, literary and critical studies, business and technical English and soft skills development. The mission of the English Department is to promote language and literature studies with the help of renewed techniques. The Department also takes general class in English for students of various disciplines to enhance their skills in spoken and written English.
